sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Flex, Spacer, Center, Text, Heading, Progress, Stack, ButtonGroup } from "@chakra-ui/react"
import Menu from './Menu'
import { BiPlay } from "react-icons/bi"

function Dashboard() {
    return (
        <>
            <Menu />
            <Flex bg="gray.300">
                <Flex w="35vw" h="240vh" bg="white" ml="12" mt="12">
                    <Heading font="" align="center" size="xs" m="5"> STATISTICS </Heading>
                </Flex>

                <Flex direction="column">
                    <Flex w="65vw" h="70vh" bg="white" m="12" mb="5">
                        <Stack direction="row">
                            <Stack>
                                <Heading m="5" size="xs">TORRENT NAME HERE</Heading>
                                <Progress ml="5" colorScheme="blue" size="lg" hasStripe value={20} />
                            </Stack>
                            <Stack>
                                <ButtonGroup>
                                    <Button>

                                    </Button>
                                    <Button>

                                    </Button>
                                    <Button>

                                    </Button>

                                </ButtonGroup>
                            </Stack>
                            
                        </Stack>
                    </Flex>
                    <Flex w="65vw" h="210vh" bg="white" ml="12">
                        <Heading m="5" size="xs">
                            TASK MANAGER
                        </Heading>
                    </Flex>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
        </>
    )
}

export default Dashboard
